product_name: Maui Jim Switchbacks Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Maui Jim Switchbacks Polarized Sunglasses sport a light frame with full shield coverage for protection against the sun's harmful rays. They let you switch lenses at the touch of a button. Proprietary interchangeable locking mechanism and interchangeable polarized shields provide coverage for many light conditions at the touch of a button. Matte Black frames feature Neutral Grey lenses for especially bright, direct sunlight; they offer rich color and contrast along with very high light production. Matte Rootbeer frames feature HCL (High Contrast Lens) Bronze lenses for added contrast on overcast or foggy days; subtle bronze tint is ideal for variable sunlight. Included clear lenses offers glare protection in extremely low light. PolarizedPlus2 lenses eliminate 99.9% of glare; patented multilayer design and lens treatment maximize color transmission and enhance visible color. Proprietary CLEARSHELL provides excellent scratch-resistance on front and back of lenses. Injection-molded, optically correct lenses are lightweight and extremely impact-resistant. Anti-corrosive spring hinges; Rabalon nose pads prevent slippage and are adjustable for a secure, custom fit. Modified rectangle shield frames complement round-, oval- and square-shaped faces and best fit medium or large faces. The Maui Jim Switchbacks Polarized Sunglasses come with a case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Switchbacks Polarized Sunglasses sport a light frame with full shield coverage for protection against the sun's harmful rays. They let you switch lenses at the touch of a button.
